title: Pork chop with stuffed baked apples, roasted shallots and boulangère potatoes
description: Meaty pork chops make a good alternative to a roast dinner if you're only cooking for two. James serves his with baked apples and slow roasted potatoes.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 Bramley apples, peeled, cored and cut in half
2 small banana shallots, left whole with skin on
